scripts.build-all: ng build --project=@mckit/core --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/layout --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/auth --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/loader --configuration production
scripts.upload-npm: ng build --project=@mckit/core --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/core --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/layout --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/layout --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/auth --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/auth --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/loader --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/loader --access public
scripts.upload-npm-odata: ng build --project=@mckit/odata --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/odata --access public
